snippet.textDisplay: It is a scary mind-fucking game. All of the Franchise is. The genre is "Horror/Survival" Quite literally you're taking the lead roll as the main character in one huge horror movie. And most of the time, it's better to run from the monsters than fight them. I've only played the first one, and it's an AWESOME game. I want to play the others so bad. >.<
snippet.textOriginal: It is a scary mind-fucking game. All of the Franchise is. The genre is "Horror/Survival" Quite literally you're taking the lead roll as the main character in one huge horror movie. And most of the time, it's better to run from the monsters than fight them. I've only played the first one, and it's an AWESOME game. I want to play the others so bad. >.<

snippet.textDisplay: Hey Everybody! I have just released my new electronic album “Sub-Zero” which is heavily influenced by the world of Silent Hill and the music of Akira Yamaoka. If you're interested you can listen to the full album on my youtube channel, as well as download the album for free!
snippet.textOriginal: Hey Everybody! I have just released my new electronic album “Sub-Zero” which is heavily influenced by the world of Silent Hill and the music of Akira Yamaoka. If you're interested you can listen to the full album on my youtube channel, as well as download the album for free!
